case.state: 'Sup?
I say mechro, you say mancer. Mechro!... You guys suck...
Anybody have some mechros they need manced?
Me and robot are gonna bitch smack ya!
Oh, uh, hey, Lilith. You get that mission from Moxxi too?
Oh... Your name is Jack, huh? Do you have a nickname or something...?
Oh... Jack, huh?... Awkward. A guy named Jack tried to kill me once. Can I just call you "Ted" or something?
Is that me? Is this some kind of glitch with the New-U Stations?
Woah! It's me! Damn, mirrors don't do me justice. I am hot! I mean, I already knew I'm hot, but damn!
Wait, is that me? Is that a digistructed clone?... Am I the digistructed clone?!
Oh, whoops, sorry, didn't realize I was already here... Well this is awkward...
I'm flattered, ~player~! You have to go out of your way to have more than one of the same character at a table, so I'm touched you did that to have more of me!
Oh, awkward, I'm already here. Should I go, or... should I go?...
Oh, uh, g-guess I'm the only girl here, huh? Th-that's cool.
O-oh, a-am I the only chick here? Cool, cool...
I-I'm the only chick here, huh? I've never been so intimidated yet so turned on... Okay, that's not true, but still...
Just us girls this match, eh? That's cool. Never the wrong time for a little self-discovery, you know?... R-right?...
No dudes, huh? Can't tell if that makes this less or more awkward. Let's just go with "less" for now.
Aw man, it's totally like a slumber party right now! I've always wanted to go to one of those!
Heh. This'll be the easiest five Eridium I've ever made.
I wonder why Moxxi wanted me to come here? Eh, oh well, a mission's a mission.
Gimme ~cards~.
Lemme have ~cards~.
I need ~cards~.
Hmm... Guess I'll trade ~cards~.
Eh... ~cards~ should work.
Hell yes! I've got the most awesomely awesome hand you could possible have!
Hell yeah! Royal flush, suckas!
Hell yeah! This is a kick-ass start!
This is pretty great!
No miscalculations here!
Hehe, just how I do!
Hell yeah! A hand as badass as my badass robot!
Read 'em and weep, suckas!... Er, well, I guess you can't read them right now, but you will!
Haha! No nerd boobs for you just yet!
Ready for some nerd boob? Well too bad, 'cause my hand rocks!
Enjoy the view, 'cause it ain't changing anytime soon!
Why, hello there, you handsome set of cards.
Never before has a set of cards been as sexy as these!
Hell yeah! I think I just got a second wind!
You ain't gankin' me that easy!
Friggin' yeah! Still in it!
♪Meedly-meedly-mowwww!♪... Sorry, that was terrible.
Hmm... There's definitely room for improvement.
Not bad, not bad.
This isn't great, but whatev.
Did I remember to turn off the lazer saw...?
I wonder if Tediore makes playing cards... That'd be pretty rad...
Heh, this makes my second pair. See what I did there?... No, I guess not, 'cause you can't see my hand...
Eh, I'm still fully clothed. A pair is no big deal. Plenty of room for error.
What? You expecting me to sweat a mediocre hand when I haven't taken anything off yet? Nah son!
What're the odds that I'll lose with this hand...?
Just a pair?... Eh, I'm sure I'll be fine!
Eh, I've gotten by with less before.
Damn. This is not a good start.
Aw, this hand is junk!
... Wait, maybe if I... nope, still bad.
Hmm... I wonder if I can fit a card loader in Deathtrap...
No amount of Discord will fix this...
Normally, duct tape can fix anything, but this?... Unless...
I, uh... may have miscalculated...
Aw, son of a whore!
Gah, high and dry!
Stupid cards, I'm the one who's supposed to be doing the screwing!
FML...
Damn it, I wanted rad cards, not bad cards!
I wonder if I can get my arm to digistruct cards too...
I'm totally boned with this hand...
Damn it. This is the CL4P-TP of poker hands...
Of course I like guns! Pretty much every girl on Pandora does!... Okay, I guess Tanis doesn't, but she's weird.
Anxious? Nah! If people don't like me, that's their problem, 'cause I know I'm awesome!
Yeah, I never really liked my school uniform, so I made it my own. I don't even wear that stupid button-up that I'm supposed to.
Don't just wish for one, build your own! It's not that hard!
Aw, it's not that great, it was a total accident. Besides, she's totally fine now, and didn't even get in trouble for shoving me or stealing DT's plans!
Man, I thought you were a rule-breaker, Twilight!
Well, yes and no. Not relics in the conventional sense, but I did go around gathering a bunch of random crap for mission objectives. Does that count?
Well, uh, I was gonna say "Science fare," but... third place...
Robot battling! Easily!
Depends. Is that Short Circuit remake out yet?
Hmm... Pandora doesn't really have any sports. Unless you count Skag-splatting.
You're streaming this, huh? Well, I guess that's a good way to get new followers, so okay, but you'd better not save the VOD!
Well it's basically intergalactic law that you have to leave any robotic limbs you have unclothed, because otherwise how would anyone know you have a badass robot limb?
I mean, there's other junk in there too, but yeah, it's metalic. Have you never heard of robot limbs?
Yo, can you just hurry up and lose already, I've got other missions to do!
Yo, can you guys just hurry up and lose already, I've got other missions to do!
Geez, I didn't realize this'd take so long. Hope everything's fine back at Sanctuary...
Can we speed this along a bit? I've got dudes to shoot.
Because we both make awesome weapons, right? Or maybe this blacksmith is also a hot redhead? Either way, I'll take that as a compliment!
Oh, you don't know? It's basically a system of government where there is no government! Having no rules rules!
Yep, I relate to that. Building robots didn't exactly get me a ton of friends in school...
Really? You think I sound smart? I would've figured with all the contractions and slang that I use that I don't sound as smart as I am.
You mean the lunchbox? That's my class mod! It gives me extra gun damage at the cost of accuracy, and also adds points in my Fancy Mathematics and Death From Above skills!
Oh, yeah, just a little workshop accident. Piece of metal flew up and hit my face. No biggie.
Heh, well first, I cut it off with a particle saw, and then I built a robotic one! In hindsight, I should've reversed my order of operations...
Oh, just some bits of metal. Nothing fancy.
Eh, I just put on whatever. I don't overthink it.
Oh, that's easy, they're for eye protection. Keeps my eyes safe from stray shrapnel, and they're tinted for welding, too!
Thinking about it, I probably got interested in robots after seeing them in movies and reading about them in books as a kid.
Pfft, hardly. I just really like these socks!
Nah, don't worry about it. My arm's not the worst reason someone's had for staring at me.
I didn't buy it, I made it! It's way better than that stock Hyperion crap.
Huh, well, I guess Pandora kinda is one big junkyard, but no, I'm a Vault Hunter.
First blood from me? NBD.
Hmm. So many things to take off. What should I start with?
Hmm. What can I take off that'll make the best first impression?...
Damn, there goes my perfect...
You can't keep a good Technomancer down!
Ha! Just a flesh wound!
'Tis but a scratch!
It take more than this to get me embarrassed!
For the record, I don't "lose" hands, I cut them off with a particle saw when I get a really great idea!
Erm... I know I still have accessories left, but looking cool is just as important as staying clothed, so...
Hmm. Which is worse, cold legs, or putting my panties on display...? Gimme a sec, I need to think this through.
So, what do you think will be next? Goggles? Socks? Whatever you're thinking, you're wrong!
Time for some more fanservice!
Damn. I'm getting awful close to failing that bonus objective...
Looks like the view's about to get even better!
Guess it can't get worse from here.
Hah! Do I even need to take anything else off?... The answer is yes because I don't want to lose...
Looks like the view's about to get just a little bit better!
Odds are, I'm gonna lose. Might as well have some fun!
First blood from me? NBD.
Hmm. So many things to take off. What should I start with?
Hmm. What can I take off that'll make the best first impression?...
Damn, there goes my perfect...
You can't keep a good Technomancer down!
Ha! Just a flesh wound!
'Tis but a scratch!
It take more than this to get me embarrassed!
For the record, I don't "lose" hands, I cut them off with a particle saw when I get a really great idea!
Erm... I know I still have accessories left, but looking cool is just as important as staying clothed, so...
Hmm. Which is worse, cold legs, or putting my panties on display...? Gimme a sec, I need to think this through.
So, what do you think will be next? Goggles? Socks? Whatever you're thinking, you're wrong!
Time for some more fanservice!
Damn. I'm getting awful close to failing that bonus objective...
Looks like the view's about to get even better!
Guess it can't get worse from here.
Hah! Do I even need to take anything else off?... The answer is yes because I don't want to lose...
Looks like the view's about to get just a little bit better!
Odds are, I'm gonna lose. Might as well have some fun!
First blood from me? NBD.
Hmm. So many things to take off. What should I start with?
Hmm. What can I take off that'll make the best first impression?...
Damn, there goes my perfect...
You can't keep a good Technomancer down!
Ha! Just a flesh wound!
'Tis but a scratch!
It take more than this to get me embarrassed!
For the record, I don't "lose" hands, I cut them off with a particle saw when I get a really great idea!
Erm... I know I still have accessories left, but looking cool is just as important as staying clothed, so...
Hmm. Which is worse, cold legs, or putting my panties on display...? Gimme a sec, I need to think this through.
So, what do you think will be next? Goggles? Socks? Whatever you're thinking, you're wrong!
Time for some more fanservice!
Damn. I'm getting awful close to failing that bonus objective...
Looks like the view's about to get even better!
Guess it can't get worse from here.
Hah! Do I even need to take anything else off?... The answer is yes because I don't want to lose...
Looks like the view's about to get just a little bit better!
Odds are, I'm gonna lose. Might as well have some fun!
Well yeah, pretty much. I mean, in a system where the only people you need around are people you want around, popularity's pretty important.
Nope, no special reasons, I just like it.
Yeah, there's a bunch of tech inside. It's, uh, pretty technical.
You mean a Health bonus? Nah, that's a different one.
One would say my life is similar to that of a Vault Hunter. One might even say that I am a Vault Hunter.
I didn't really mean that it makes me sound less smart, just not as smart, you know?
Well, uh, that depends: how smart do I seem?
Well, I don't exactly "work" anywhere. At least, not in the sense of having a job. I do metalwork around Sanctuary, though.
Oh, you know, typical metal shop accident. The kind of thing that safety goggles were designed for.
Well, I was trying to figure out a good way to quickly summon Deathtrap, and then I got the idea to cut my arm off and store his digistruct data in it so I can summon him anytime!
Well, I did accidentally slice halfway through my arm with some sheet metal, but that could've been fixed with some Insta-Health.
Nah, no problems at all! In fact, this is way better, 'cause I can digistruct claws and punch through concrete! It's so badass!
Uh, both? I do have a lot of shirts with skulls on them, but not all of my shirts have skulls. I just happen to be wearing one of the ones that do today.
Do people really do that?... I mean, I guess I do, but it's more like picking what I feel like wearing that morning.
Uh, well, yes and yes, but that's not what I meant. I meant, like, the crap that sometimes flies off of stuff when cutting it, you know?
Maybe? But we have things like shields, and Insta-Health, and New-U Stations, so it's all good. Getting something in your eye still hurts like hell, though.
Oh, you know, the usual stuff: kicking ass, taking names, and generally being badass.
Oh yeah, they're hella comfortable. I also just really like the stripes.
Yeah, they give me +10 to my Sexiness stat.
Well, it depends. The last Vault we opened just had a giant alien monster inside of it, so they could have anything inside. The real money in Vault Hunting is in the side quests!
Don't worry, the most dangerous thing I have with me right now is my mind... and Deathtrap...
Well, I didn't exactly lose it. I cut it off after I got a really cool idea!
Yeah, like bank vaults, except way bigger and way more ancient. Some say they contain tons of riches!
Alright, nothing too exciting for now. Just my toolbelt.
I'll just take off my toolbelt. Not like I'm using any of this junk right now anyway.
Time for another mediocre pick: my vest.
Guess I'll take off my vest next. Don't fall asleep on me!
Yeah yeah, "vests are boring," but I gotta take it off to get to my shirt anyway, so shut up!
My shoes don't feel like enough... but I don't wanna take off my socks...
Just shoes... doesn't feel like enough somehow... but I love my socks...
Shoes on their own seem cheap... but these socks are sexy AF...
Guess I'll ditch my skirt now.
Looks like it's panty time.
Alright, no holding back now!
Playtime's over! Time to get serious!
I think I'll keep my socks on a bit longer. Which means...
Welp, I've already come this far, might as well go all the way...
Alright, I think you've earned this. I'm going to take everything off now, no more buffering.
Nah, not really. If you injure yourself badly enough, the adrenaline just takes care of the pain. Connecting my arm is the part that sucked ass. Nerves and whatnot.
Well that and the ability to blow the faces off of people who pose a threat to you.
Oh yeah, totally! Like this one time, I tried to find a new body for this Loader, and he kept trying to kill me, so I turned him into a talking gun!
I felt like wearing my skull shirt, duh.
Just be ready for a lot of people trying to kill you. Like a lot. With guns, and explosives, and saws, and forklift exoskeletons, and forklift robots, and...
Nah, you're not thinking outside the box! You can put whatever you want in a lunchbox!
You'd be surprised how compact technology has become! I mean, I can fit Deathtrap inside of my arm!
I just mean, it's like, I don't sound dumb, just not smart, you see now?
Uh... Well, it gives me a bonus to gun damage, and shooting people is what I do. Is that what you mean?
Oh yeah, I got a bunch! One gives me more assault rifle damage, one gives me a bonus to accuracy and reload speed, and so on. It's good to have options!
Pilot? Hah, I wish! No one in their right mind would let me fly!
Well thanks, ~other~, and don't worry, I can explain what you didn't understand later.
You know, Digistruct? Building physical objects from data? You don't know that?
Break? Hah! What am I, an amateur?... I mean techincally I am, but still...
Oh, Deathtrap is my killer robot! I designed him for a science fair... and got third place...
I could've, but it would've been inelegant, and ugly, and like a million times less badass.
I mean yeah, these are the kinds of risks you take in shop. Haven't you ever heard of people losing fingers on saws and stuff? It happens.
Oh, Sanctuary's this city built on top of an old mining ship. Used to be near Three Horns, but we had a space laser problem not to long ago, so now it's flying near the Highlands.
Oh, Sanctuary's this city built on top of an old mining ship. Safest place on Pandora - relatively speaking.
Huh, yeah, I guess you could make that comparison. Although I guess blacksmithes don't fix holes in people's walls.
Not really. I just think they're really cool.
Well, I wore my skull panties today too, but you're gonna have to get me to lose again if you want to see them.
I've got my shield for all the other crap, but it doesn't help in the shop... Don't ask me why.
Psychos.
Vault Hunting.
Aw, but what's adventure without a little danger?
Thanks, I think so too!
You should totally ask! I bet you'd rock them!
Well, I did do some sand-sailing and took down the incorrigible Captain Scarlett. I dunno if that really makes me a pirate, though.
Nah, I'm not a pirate. I just like skulls.
Oh, sorry, I said I cut it off! This way, I can summon Deathtrap wherever and whenever I want!
I mean, some say they contain tons of riches inside, but the last one we opened just had an alien demon thing inside.
I'm starting to feel a little self-concious here...
Hey, don't get mad. I'm dropping all the crap dangling from it too. That's, like, seven things I just removed.
Hey, don't get mad. I'm dropping all the crap dangling from it too - including my shield.
I've got several important things hanging from that, so that should count for a lot.
My shield, my hammer, and my class mod hang from that, so that'd better count for a lot.
Nothing special about it. Just a sleeveless hoodie, that might have some washers in its pockets now that I think about it...
Now that I think about it, I might have left some washers in the pockets. Eh, oh well! Doesn't matter!
Hope you like shoulders... Er, shoulder, singular.
I have a bad habit of leaving things in my pockets, so there's probably some extra junk in there too.
Might as well take off my glove and junk too.
I'll take off all the crap on my arm too. That feels more fair.
Is it weird that I don't feel much different? That skirt was kinda breezy.
What can I say? I like skulls.
I just really like these socks, okay?
I'm sure most girls wear shorts under their skirts or whatever, but why do that when it's perfectly legal to shoot pervs in the face on Pandora?
Yeah, I go braless. NBD.
Yeah, they're a rockin' pair. I know.
Sorry, I didn't have time to shave before coming here.
Hope you like little red bushes! I didn't have time to shave...
There! Now I'm as nude as I can get. Well, except for the bandage, I guess, but let's just keep that on.
Don't worry, I'm not going to try to get a second wind off of my bandage. I'm not some kind of psycho obsessed with winning.
I work naked sometimes, you know. Can't get your clothes covered in hydraulic fluid if you're not wearing any!
Ha! In your face! Your crappy hand was crappier than mine!
Damn that was close!
Holy hell that was close!
Come on, noob! Nah, I'm just playin', you're cool.
You're up, ~name~. Make it good!
Get to strippin', you!
Don't hate the playa, hate the game.
So, you gonna strip, or is my robot gonna do it for you?
What're you waitng for? Drop 'em! Or it! Or whatever you're taking off!
Come on, ~name~! Hop to it!
Less talk, more rock!
Make it good, ~name~! Don't forget, I brought a killer robot with me!
Stripping time!
You're a space pirate, huh? But you don't have a hook or a pegleg. Do you at least have a sweet hat?
A fellow inventor, huh? Didn't expect to meet one here!
Oh, the butterfly's playing? I thought it was just here to watch.
Ha! In your face! Your crappy hand was crappier than mine!
Damn that was close!
Holy hell that was close!
Come on, noob! Nah, I'm just playin', you're cool.
You're up, ~name~. Make it good!
Get to strippin', you!
Don't hate the playa, hate the game.
So, you gonna strip, or is my robot gonna do it for you?
What're you waitng for? Drop 'em! Or it! Or whatever you're taking off!
Come on, ~name~! Hop to it!
Less talk, more rock!
Make it good, ~name~! Don't forget, I brought a killer robot with me!
So, you gonna strip, or is my robot gonna do it for you?
What're you waitng for? Drop 'em! Or it! Or whatever you're taking off!
Come on, ~name~! Hop to it!
Less talk, more rock!
Make it good, ~name~! Don't forget, I brought a killer robot with me!
Stripping time!
Oh my god, a tie!
A tie? What're the odds?
Well, this is awkward... Do we just... move on, or what?...
Aw, damn it, a tie.
The hell? A tie?
A tie? What're the odds?... Seriously, what're the odds? I can't be assed to do the math right now.
Sorry, did you say something, ~name~? I was too busy staring at your junk!
I'm cool with you taking ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off as long as you're cool with me staring at your junk!
Uh, yep... ~clothing.ifPlural(Those... sure are things|That... sure is a thing)~ you can take off...
~Clothing~, huh?... That's all?... Cool...
Yeah... Real exciting, there, chief...
Your choice is as unexciting as it is perfectly legal.
Are you freakin' kidding?
Stalling? Really?
You lookin' to get capped? 'Cause that's a great way to get capped.
Aw, lame!
Oh, yeah... ~clothing~... I'm so wet right now...
You ever heard of a chick getting turned on by this? 'Cause I haven't.
Guess if I played more like ~name~, I might not have lost.
I don't care what you take off anymore, 'cause you already got the best part hangin' out!
Whatev, let's just move on!
Done yet?
Guess I can't complain. Even if I am getting a little bored.
Aw... I know I shouldn't complain, but geez, ~clothing.ifPlural(those're|that's)~ like, the furthest from exciting you can get!
This's about as exciting as Claptrap's birthday party... Well, at least that had pizza...
You could've at least put some razzle-dazzle in it, you know...
What a waste of a turn.
Way to waste your turn, ~name~.
~clothing.ifPlural(Those'd|That'd)~ better be special edition ~clothing~.
Your move is perfectly legal, but that's exactly why it's boring! C'mon! Break some rules! Throw us a curve ball!
Pro tip: try not to piss off me or my robot.
What would you call someone who's turned on by this? A ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~exual|~clothing~-sexual)~?
I feel like a guinea pig in an experiment to find the fastest way to turn someone off...
I was too generous with my accessories, now that I think about it.
So what, you got on a tiny little pair of shoes or something?
Aw yeah, there we go! Better late than never!
Also, on a different note, that eyepiece is super outdated. You know we have ECHOs now, right? I heard they're even working on an ECHO-2! So stoked for it!
Sorry, did you say something, ~name~? I was too busy staring at your tits!
I'm cool with you taking ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off as long as you're cool with me staring at your tits!
Uh, yep... ~clothing.ifPlural(Those... sure are things|That... sure is a thing)~ you can take off...
~Clothing~, huh?... That's all?... Cool...
Yeah... Real exciting, there, chief...
Your choice is as unexciting as it is perfectly legal.
Are you freakin' kidding?
Stalling? Really?
You lookin' to get capped? 'Cause that's a great way to get capped.
Aw, lame!
Oh, yeah... ~clothing~... I'm so wet right now...
You ever heard of a chick getting turned on by this? 'Cause I haven't.
Guess if I played more like ~name~, I might not have lost.
Oh my god, you're a person! How the hell did you do that?!
Wha-? Aw man! You blindsided me!
Oh, sorry, I thought ECHOs were, like, an intergalactic thing. An ECHO is a comunication device, GPS, notebook, storage device, uh... what am I forgetting?...
I don't care what you take off anymore, 'cause you already got the best part hangin' out!
Whatev, let's just move on!
Done yet?
Guess I can't complain. Even if I am getting a little bored.
Aw... I know I shouldn't complain, but geez, ~clothing.ifPlural(those're|that's)~ like, the furthest from exciting you can get!
This's about as exciting as Claptrap's birthday party... Well, at least that had pizza...
You could've at least put some razzle-dazzle in it, you know...
What a waste of a turn.

I feel like a guinea pig in an experiment to find the fastest way to turn someone off...
I was too generous with my accessories, now that I think about it.
Are you feeling it yet, ~name~?
That's a step in the right direction!
Beat it, ~clothing~, ~name~'s gotta get to the good stuff!
Well... That's progress, at least.
Ugh. Freakin' ~clothing~...
GJ.
Progress!
We'll get you naked yet!
That's more like it, but don't stop now!
Suddenly, I feel loads more naked...
Rocket boots? Awesome! I want a pair!
Are you feeling it yet, ~name~?
That's a step in the right direction!
Beat it, ~clothing~, ~name~'s gotta get to the good stuff!
Well... That's progress, at least.
Ugh. Freakin' ~clothing~...
Aw, dude, I had a pair of socks just like that! Except I spilled oil on them, and then they became boring ol' black socks...
Ooh, uh, never mind... You okay?
GJ.
Progress!
We'll get you naked yet!
That's more like it, but don't stop now!
Suddenly, I feel loads more naked...
Now we're talking!
Hell yeah! Take it off!
Aw yeah! Take it off, my dude!
That's more like it!
Hell yeah! Get on my level, boy!
Now this is strip poker!
See, now this is what this game is about!
I like what I see so far, but you're not stopping here!
Now if you could lose a few more hands, that'd be great.
Oh, you think you're done? Nah, dude, you're going down! And so's the rest of your outfit!
Look at all that skin! It's very nice skin! I bet your skin is pretty soft! (Stop saying skin!)
Aw, I was thinking there wouldn't be anything under your ~clothing~.
Wait, you actually wear something under your ~clothing~? Aw man...
Aw, I was thinking there wouldn't be anything under your ~clothing~.
Wait, you actually wear something under your ~clothing~? Aw man...
Now we're talking!
Hell yeah! Take it off!
Aw yeah! Take it off, my dude!
That's more like it!
Hell yeah! Get on my level, girl!
Eh, don't worry about your shirt! I can just hack the nearest New-U Station to give you a new one!... We might have to deal with a second you, though...
Now this is strip poker!
See, now this is what this game is about!
I like what I see so far, but you're not stopping here!
Now if you could lose a few more hands, that'd be great.
Oh, you think you're done? Nah, dude, you're going down! And so's the rest of your outfit!
Now if you could lose a few more hands, that'd be great.

Aw, I was thinking there wouldn't be anything under your ~clothing~.
Wait, you actually wear something under your ~clothing~? Aw man...
Aw, I was thinking there wouldn't be anything under your ~clothing~.
Wait, you actually wear something under your ~clothing~? Aw man...
Hell yeah, let's see those pecks!
So, what's it gonna be? Hairy, smooth, fit, flabby, scrawny?
Time for me to see your chest. Better not disappoint!
Wow! You work out?
That's a great chest - and trust me, I know a thing or two about chests! I open 'em all the time!
Nice glutes!... Wait, crap, those're in hips, not chests...
Very nice! Very, uh... chesty!
Aw yeah, look at those pecks, and, uh... delts!
Let's open it up and see what pops out!... Did that loot inuendo land...?
Let's see that Gravity Hammer of yours!
Lemme see you're nuts and bolts!
Is that a pistol in your ~clothing~ or are you just having a good time?
Time to drop trou!
